folder: Richmond Terrace & Wall Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Terrace, adjoining the N. W. corner of Wall Street, showing Police Headquarters of the Borough
of Richmond. The view is north.
About 1930
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, at a later date, from the opposite
direction.
June 13, 1937
P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Wall Street
